data.title: Polynomial
data.solution:
<?php
$P = stream_get_line(STDIN, 150 + 1, "\n");
$P = explode(" ", $P);

fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $t);
for ($i = 0; $i < $t; $i++)
{
    fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $X);
    $sum = 0;
    for($j=0;$j<count($P);$j++) {
        $sum += $P[$j]*$X**$j;
    }
    echo $sum."\n";
}
?>
data.statement:
You are the day before your mathematics assignment is due and you have to calculate tens or hundreds of times the image of a real by a polynomial function, make a program to go faster!

<<Example>>
If the coefficients given are {{1 5 8}}, this represents the polynomial function {{1+5x+8x^2}}.
If you have to pass {{2}} through the function (i.e. x = 2), the output is {{43}} because 1+5*2+8*2^2 = 43.
data.stubGenerator:
read P:string(150)
read t:int
loop t read X:int
write Write Y=P(X) for each line

<<Line 2 :>> [[t]] numbers of [[X]] (which is the number of lines that will follow)
<<Next [[t]] lines :>> each containing an integer ([[X]]) you will have to pass through your polynomial function.
data.outputDescription: <<[[t]] lines :>>  each containing the images ([[Y]]) by the polynomial function of the numbers in each line ([[X]]).

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are the day before your mathematics assignment is due and you have to calculate tens or hundreds of times the image of a real by a polynomial function, make a program to go faster!

Example
If the coefficients given are 1 5 8, this represents the polynomial function 1+5x+8x^2.
If you have to pass 2 through the function (i.e. x = 2), the output is 43 because 1+5*2+8*2^2 = 43.
Input
Line 1 : a string P representing the coefficients (integers) of your polynomial function separated by spaces.
Line 2 : t numbers of X (which is the number of lines that will follow)
Next t lines : each containing an integer (X) you will have to pass through your polynomial function.
Output
t lines : each containing the images (Y) by the polynomial function of the numbers in each line (X).
Constraints
0<= length(P) <=20
0<= t <=15
0<= X,Y <= 2000
Example
Input
42
1
3
Output
42
